it.polimi.group03.util

Class CommonUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.group03.util.CommonUtil

  • public class CommonUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an utility class.

    All methods of this class are helpers of the project.

    Each method is responsible to perform some minor action non related to the mechanics of the game but helpful and used in various instances.

    Since:
    11/11/2015.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    cecibloom, megireci, tatibloom

      • equalsIgnoreCase

        public static boolean equalsIgnoreCase(java.lang.String s1,
                       java.lang.String s2)
        Checks whether two strings are equal without regarding the case.
        Parameters:
        s1 - string to compare.
        s2 - string to compare.
        Returns:
        [null,null] true
        [" 123 ","123"] true
        ["ABC","abc"] true
        false in any other case.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
